content.raw:
I get consistent failures running `integration/playback::ReplayLog`:

    caguero@bb8:~/workspace/ign-transport_ekumen/build$ ./bin/INTEGRATION_playback --gtest_filter=*ReplayLog$*
    Note: Google Test filter = *ReplayLog
    [==========] Running 1 test from 1 test case.
    [----------] Global test environment set-up.
    [----------] 1 test from playback
    [ RUN      ] playback.ReplayLog
    Chirping [100] times on [3] topics:
     -- /foo
     -- /bar
     -- /baz
    Waiting to for playback to finish...
     Done waiting...
    Playback finished!
    /home/caguero/workspace/ign-transport_ekumen/log/test/integration/playback.cc:159: Failure
    Value of: handle->EndTime() - handle->StartTime()
      Actual: 8-byte object <99-3C F3-06 00-00 00-00>
    Expected: expected_duration
    Which is: 8-byte object <63-00 00-00 00-00 00-00>
    [  FAILED  ] playback.ReplayLog (3703 ms)
